ctx: intros X Y f HFX dec.
exceptions.tactic: apply bij_finite with (f := f) (X := X); auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y HFX : FiniteT X dec : forall y1 y2 : Y, y1 = y2 \\/ y1 <> y2 Unable to unify "FiniteT Y" with "Finite Y (Im Full_set f)".

ctx: intros X Y f HFX dec.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> (forall y1 y2 : Y, y1 = y2 \/ y1 <> y2) -> Finite Y (Im Full_set f)

Premises:
Finite : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Prop
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments T
Inductive FiniteT : Type -> Prop := empty_finite : FiniteT False | add_finite : forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> FiniteT (option T) | bij_finite : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> invertible f -> FiniteT Y Arguments FiniteT _%type_scope Arguments add_finite _%type_scope Arguments bij_finite (_ _)%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive Im (U V : Type) (X : Ensemble U) (f : U -> V) : Ensemble V := Im_intro : forall x : U, In X x -> forall y : V, y = f x -> In (Im X f) y Arguments Im {U V}%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Im_intro (_ _)%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Inductive Full_set (U : Type) : Ensemble U := Full_intro : forall x : U, In Full_set x Arguments Full_set {U}%type_scope Arguments Full_intro _%type_scope
bij_finite : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> invertible f -> FiniteT Y
Included_Strict_Included : forall (U : Type) (X Y : Ensemble U), Included X Y -> Strict_Included X Y \/ X = Y
Inductive FiniteT : Type -> Prop := empty_finite : FiniteT False | add_finite : forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> FiniteT (option T) | bij_finite : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> invertible f -> FiniteT Y Arguments FiniteT _%type_scope Arguments add_finite _%type_scope Arguments bij_finite (_ _)%type_scope _%function_scope
Union_preserves_Finite : forall (U : Type) (X Y : Ensemble U), Finite U X -> Finite U Y -> Finite U (Union X Y)
Generalized_induction_on_finite_sets : forall (U : Type) (P : Ensemble U -> Prop), (forall X : Ensemble U, Finite U X -> (forall Y : Ensemble U, Strict_Included Y X -> P Y) -> P X) -> forall X : Ensemble U, Finite U X -> P X
FiniteT_ind : forall P : Type -> Prop, P False -> (forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> P T -> P (option T)) -> (forall (X Y : Type) (f1 : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> P X -> invertible f1 -> P Y) -> forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> P T
FiniteT_sind : forall P : Type -> SProp, P False -> (forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> P T -> P (option T)) -> (forall (X Y : Type) (f1 : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> P X -> invertible f1 -> P Y) -> forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> P T
G_aux : forall (U : Type) (P : Ensemble U -> Prop), (forall X : Ensemble U, Finite U X -> (forall Y : Ensemble U, Strict_Included Y X -> P Y) -> P X) -> P Empty_set
Inductive invertible (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) : Prop := intro_invertible : forall g : Y -> X, (forall x : X, g (f x) = x) -> (forall y : Y, f (g y) = y) -> invertible f Arguments invertible {X Y}%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments intro_invertible {X Y}%type_scope (_ _ _ _)%function_scope
List.count_occ_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (decA : forall x1 x2 : A, {x1 = x2} + {x1 <> x2}) (decB : forall y1 y2 : B, {y1 = y2} + {y1 <> y2}), (forall x1 x2 : A, f x1 = f x2 -> x1 = x2) -> forall (x : A) (l : list A), List.count_occ decA l x = List.count_occ decB (List.map f l) (f x)
finite_image : forall (X : Ensemble ?U) (f : ?U -> ?V), Finite ?U X -> Finite ?V (Im X f) where ?U : [ |- Type] ?V : [ |- Type]
Im_intro : forall (U V : Type) (X : Ensemble U) (f : U -> V) (x : U), In X x -> forall y : V, y = f x -> In (Im X f) y
Im_def : forall (X : Ensemble ?U) (f : ?U -> ?V) (x : ?U), In X x -> In (Im X f) (f x) where ?U : [ |- Type] ?V : [ |- Type]
Im_add : forall (X : Ensemble ?U) (x : ?U) (f : ?U -> ?V), Im (Add X x) f = Add (Im X f) (f x) where ?U : [ |- Type] ?V : [ |- Type]
Im_inv : forall (X : Ensemble ?U) (f : ?U -> ?V) (y : ?V), In (Im X f) y -> exists x : ?U, In X x /\ f x = y where ?U : [ |- Type] ?V : [ |- Type]
Add_preserves_Finite : forall (U : Type) (X : Ensemble U) (x : U), Finite U X -> Finite U (Add X x)
Im_ind : forall (U V : Type) (X : Ensemble U) (f : U -> V) (P : V -> Prop), (forall x : U, In X x -> forall y : V, y = f x -> P y) -> forall v : V, Im X f v -> P v
Im_sind : forall (U V : Type) (X : Ensemble U) (f : U -> V) (P : V -> SProp), (forall x : U, In X x -> forall y : V, y = f x -> P y) -> forall v : V, Im X f v -> P v
finite_dec_forall : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop), FiniteT X -> (forall x : X, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> {forall x : X, P x} + {exists x : X, ~ P x}
finite_dec_exists : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop), FiniteT X -> (forall x : X, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> {exists x : X, P x} + {forall x : X, ~ P x}
Finite_downward_closed : forall (U : Type) (A : Ensemble U), Finite U A -> forall X : Ensemble U, Included X A -> Finite U X
cardinal_finite : forall (U : Type) (X : Ensemble U) (n : nat), cardinal U X n -> Finite U X
finite_cardinal : forall (U : Type) (X : Ensemble U), Finite U X -> exists n : nat, cardinal U X n
finite_eq_dec : forall X : Type, FiniteT X -> forall x y : X, {x = y} + {x <> y}
less_than_empty : forall (U : Type) (X : Ensemble U), Included X Empty_set -> X = Empty_set

```coq
intros X Y f HFX dec.
apply bij_finite with (f := f) (X := X); auto.
intros y1 y2; apply dec.
Qed.```

original: intros X Y f HFX dec. apply bij_finite with (f := f) (X := X); auto. intros y1 y2; apply dec.
